A: Thanks for your question on Chat Doctor. I can understand your situation and problem. By your history and description, I think you are having cough variant asthma. Points in favor of this are1. Positive family history in mother and brother2. Chest x-ray was normal, so infection has been ruled out.3. Chronic symptoms, not improved with routine Chat Doctor. So better to consult pulmonologist and get done PFT (pulmonary function test) to rule out cough variant asthma. You may need inhaled bronchodilators and inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) for control.
